meanings.sent1: I need to dewax my surfboard before I can go surfing.
meanings.sent2: She used a special solution to dewax the car and make it shine.
meanings.sent3: After the candle melted, it was time to dewax the holder.
meanings.sent4: The cleaner worked hard to dewax the floors, making them spotless.
meanings.sent5: The beekeeper had to dewax the honeycomb to extract the pure honey.

meanings.definition: The process of removing wax from a surface.
meanings.sent1: The dewax of the car was necessary to reveal its true color.
meanings.sent2: During the dewax, the technician noticed some imperfections in the paint.
meanings.sent3: The dewax of the statue revealed intricate details hidden beneath the wax.
meanings.sent4: The dewax of the floor left a clean and smooth surface.
meanings.sent5: The dewax of the candle was done carefully to avoid any damage to the wax sculpture.
